TopicTitle: Option to Enable Kerbal Experience in Science Mode

Articles.Content: Title says it all. I believe KSP needs the option to enable Kerbal Experience in Science Mode.

> 
> Title says it all. I believe KSP needs the option to enable Kerbal Experience in Science Mode.

Yeah, seems like a bit of an oversight, since the scientists modify the rate of science collection.

As a workaround, I suggest just using full career mode, giving yourself as much funds as you want, and then ignoring the bits of career mode that don't interest you.

> 
> Yeah, seems like a bit of an oversight, since the scientists modify the rate of science collection.
> As a workaround, I suggest just using full career mode, giving yourself as much funds as you want, and then ignoring the bits of career mode that don't interest you.

As an alternative workaround. If you are okay with editing save files, start a new career and delete the funding, reputation, contract, strategy, and upgradable building SCENARIO{}s from the save file. You will essentially be playing a science mods game with kerbal experience. I read somewhere (a post from Harvester no less) that the game should cope fine when you edit out the different scenarios like that.
